node.description:
[Website](https://zaqzaqzaq.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/zaxic_r) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/zaq39/)

ZAQ began to learn the piano at age three. During her college years, her idol was Minori Chihara, and it was during this time she decided to become a singer. However, she failed all her auditions. In junior high school, her favorite bands were Mongol800 and Going Steady, two rock groups which she was addicted to. Self-taught, her composing and works were characterized by a unique style which is unrestricted by music theory and musicology.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1314120680091209728)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/154741/)._
Animator, character designer and illustrator affiliated with [Craftar](https://anilist.co/studio/6156).

[Website](https://zaqzaqzaq.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/zaxic_r) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/zaq39/)

[Website](https://zaqzaqzaq.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/zaxic_r) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/zaq39/)

ZAQ began to learn the piano at age three. During her college years, her idol was Minori Chihara, and it was during this time she decided to become a singer. However, she failed all her auditions. In junior high school, her favorite bands were Mongol800 and Going Steady, two rock groups which she was addicted to. Self-taught, her composing and works were characterized by a unique style which is unrestricted by music theory and musicology.

__Real name:__ Asuka Kato (加藤あすか)

[Website](http://www.spacecraft.co.jp/yuuki_aira/)

A J pop singer attached to the company Lantis. She began her career in 2007 performing in [Yuki Kajura](https://anilist.co/staff/100077)'s [FictionJunction](https://anilist.co/staff/103691) as "FictionJunction ASUKA". She released her debut album- Reflection on July 2, 2008.

Non-anime roles:
Hom-kun in "Atelier Meruru" (VG) (Japanese)
Theme Song Performance (OP/ED) for "Root Double -Before Crime * After Days-" (Visual novel) (Japanese)

__[Website](https://www.music-yoshinobu.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/soundyoshi)__

__Birthplace:__ Gunma Prefecture, Japan

__Yoshinobu Takeichi__ is a Japanese guitarist, composer and arranger. He sometimes also does lyrics.

__[Website](https://www.music-yoshinobu.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/soundyoshi)__

__Birthplace:__ Gunma Prefecture, Japan

__Yoshinobu Takeichi__ is a Japanese guitarist, composer and arranger. He sometimes also does lyrics.
